name: StopThePlague
description:
StopThePlague is a Simulation game made for the Ludum Dare 51 GameJam

!!!!!! IF YOU PLAY IN BROWSER. SCROLL TO THE BOTTOM RIGHT BUTTON TO OPEN THE GAME IN FULLSCREEN !!!!!!!

Controls:

WASD/Arrows - move

1/2/3/4 - change syringes

F - Interact

Space - Dash

Enter - Skip wave

How To Play:

Every 10 Seconds (or less if you skip time) a wave of viruses will spawn and infect people, your job is to cure them by using the right syringe for the specific virus. You can refill your syringes at the syringe shops.

Try to get the highest score possible by keeping people uninfected, skipping time and spending as little as possible on the shops!
